topics.body:
"@trashboat":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53d049156368722058140000#post_53d049156368722058140000

1) If the fight takes places in a Universe different from the one Kabuto comes from, the Zecter can be removed from him, preventing him to transform

2) Kabuto can move at near faster than light velocities, so someone who can move faster has the speed advantage

3) Technopath is someone who can manipulate technology the same way someone like Magneto controls metal. The Zecter works more based on technology, thus, someone like that can control the Zecter.

"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53d04a746368721f20440000#post_53d04a746368721f20440000

death grips had the same budget that we have when we want to go to the store and buy some soda and chips.

but they wanted to give the experience of somebody trapped in an unknown place going slowly insane.

so they fucked around with effects till it had the thing they wanted to give.
